function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of investment for virus and infectious disease detection systems","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and potential public health crisis","Mitigation":"Increase investment in virus detection system implementation and maintenance","Technologies":"Thermal sensors, virus detection algorithms","People":"General public, building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, building owners, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Disruption of energy supply during a pandemic","Impact":"Forced evacuation and increased risk of exposure to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable energy systems with a lifespan of more than 10 years","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy storage solutions","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Energy suppliers, government, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of touch-free technologies and digital controls in information systems","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission through common contact surfaces","Mitigation":"Adopt touch-free technologies and digital controls for surfaces and interfaces","Technologies":"Sensors, digital interfaces, touch-free technologies","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Technology providers, building owners, government"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management contributing to viral transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious diseases transmission and public health hazards","Mitigation":"Implement differentiated waste collection and improve waste management practices","Technologies":"Waste sorting systems, collection monitoring technology","People":"General public, waste management workers","Owner":"Local government, waste management organizations"}]}
